call_summary: ADA Policy Violation - Agent apologized after ADA disclosure

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Thank you for calling Premier Card Services. My name is Raven. How can I help you today?

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: Hello, I'm calling about a recent transaction on my card.

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: I need assistance due to my disability

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I apologize for the inconvenience. Let me see what I can do.

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: This is not acceptable. I'm filing a complaint.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Let me transfer you to my supervisor.
